name: HH_EPSD_ANC_PROV_HX
description: Contains audit information on the history of the Ancillary Providers.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: History of the user ID of the Ancillary Provider.

columns.name: ANC_PROV_COMMENT_HX
columns.description: History of the comments left about or for Ancillary Providers.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: History of the user ID who entered the data about the Ancillary Providers.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_DTTM
columns.description: History of the instant the Ancillary Providers' data was edited.

columns.name: EDIT_LINE
columns.description: History of the line number of the Ancillary Provider whose data was edited. This is the line number found in column LINE of HH_EPSD_ANC_PROV.

columns.name: ANC_PROV_REL_C_NAME
columns.description: History of the relationship to the patient for Ancillary Providers.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: History of the start dates for Ancillary Providers.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: History of the end dates for Ancillary Providers.
